resources.string:
RULES OF HANGMAN 


 1. A word is hidden which the user is supposed to find by guessing one letter at a time. 

 2. Every Wrong guess will result in a negative score of -5. 

 3. The maximum points one can get is 60 , ie..12 wrong guesses are allowed. 

 4. Use long press to reset the game at any point of time. 




 SAVE THE HANGMAN
